General.Name: Jiin Yeeh Ding Enterprise Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiin Yeeh Ding Enterprises Corp. engages in recycling and refining precious metals in Taiwan. It operates professional cleaning and recycling facilities that clean shutters, recycle precious metals, and prevent pollution, as well as owns recycling and cleaning vehicles. The company serves semiconductor, printer circuit, computer components, passive components, telecommunication, and other industries. Jiin Yeen Ding Enterprise Corp. was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Hsinchu City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 599, Hsibing Road, Hsinchu City, Taiwan

2.Name: Yao Xin  Yang
2.Title: Deputy Gen. Mang. of Fin. and Admin.
